response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your daily routine. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its true value to be well above $80. Considering the cost of production and the value it brings, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at $120. This is a limited-time opportunity, so I hope you'll find this price attractive and consider making a purchase.", "product_price": 120}
